question:
Which among the following is/are the after-effect(s) of deforestation
  1. Increased run-off leading to soil erosion
  2. Recharging of ground-water table
  3. Flash floods
explanation: Deforestation leads to decrease in ground water as the water will not be hold by soil anymore. The trees help in recharging of ground water. It also leads to flash floods as the surface runoff increases.
